name: Mini-strike
body:
### Readme
COME ON! YOU THINK THIS PROJECT NEEDS A README? SERIOUSLY??? JUST OPEN THE PROJECT WITH XCODE! WELL... YOU HAVE TO INSTALL COCOS2D-X BEFORE THAT...

### Dependencies
Xcode above 4.0 & cocos2d-x installed properly.

### Install
NO.

### License
WHATEVER

### Authors
Shuaiying Hou ([reckhou@me.com](mailto: reckhou@me.com)) 

### Downloads
You can download this project in either zip or tar formats.
You can also clone the project with Git by running:

>$ git clone git://github.com/syhou/Mini-Strike

get the source code on GitHub : [syhou/Mini-Strike](syhou/Mini-Strike)
tagline: A small iOS game based on cocos2d-x engine V1.0.1. It was also based on a demo program but with many issues on new engine version, I fixed that and decided to make it open source.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
